ENGLISH: United Nations General Assembly Resolution 44/34, The International Convention Against the Recruitment, Use, Financing and Training of Mercenaries.
Ratify The International Convention Against the Recruitment, Use, Financing and Training of Mercenaries.
Withdraw from The International Convention Against the Recruitment, Use, Financing and Training of Mercenaries.
United Nations General Assembly Resolution 44/34, The International Convention Against the Recruitment, Use, Financing and Training of Mercenaries has been opened for voting.
Shall we receive notifications when nations decide their vote on the current UN Resolution undergoing a vote?\nThese can be turned off at any time by an international decision.

United Nations General Assembly Resolution 44/34, The International Convention Against the Recruitment, Use, Financing and Training of Mercenaries, has been defeated by vote in the United Nations General Assembly.

United Nations General Assembly Resolution 44/34, The International Convention Against the Recruitment, Use, Financing and Training of Mercenaries, has passed its vote in the United Nations General Assembly.

We have the opportunity to vote on United Nations General Assembly Resolution 44/34, The International Convention Against the Recruitment, Use, Financing and Training of Mercenaries, at the UN General Assembly.\nWe can either vote For it, Abstain, or vote Against it.
We have ratified the UN Mercenary Convention.
We have withdrawn from the UN Mercenary Convention.
